sentences.en: a tailor-made course of study
sentences.cn: 专门设置的课程

sentences.en: Are you going to find out how to tailor RUP by yourself, or are you going to hire an external RUP consultant or process engineer?
sentences.cn: 您打算自己找出如何剪裁 RUP 的方法吗，或者您打算从外面雇佣一个 RUP 顾问或过程工程师吗？

sentences.en: Each client's portfolio is tailor-made.
sentences.cn: 每位客户的投资组合都是量身打造的。

sentences.en: He asked the tailor to make over his trousers.
sentences.cn: 他叫裁缝修改他的裤子.

sentences.en: He established himeself as a tailor.
sentences.cn: 他以做裁缝为业.

sentences.en: He seems tailor - made for the job.
sentences.cn: 他好像很适合这项工作.

sentences.en: He was wearing a tweed suit that looked tailor-made.
sentences.cn: 他身穿一套粗花呢西服，看上去像是量身定做的。

sentences.en: I tailor-make music according to the person.
sentences.cn: 我因人而异地谱写音乐。

sentences.en: I was put in the tailor shop, and I loved it. I was promoted to overseer.
sentences.cn: 我被安排到缝纫车间，结果我很喜欢这项工作，后来还晋升为工头。

sentences.en: In his youth his father bound him out to a tailor.
sentences.cn: 他年轻时他父亲叫他去给一个裁缝当学徒。

sentences.en: Mr. Tailor is a good judge of the fine arts.
sentences.cn: 泰勒先生是美术鉴赏行家.

sentences.en: The needle left a prick in the tailor's finger.
sentences.cn: 裁缝的手指上有个针扎的孔.

sentences.en: The tailor has butchered this suit.
sentences.cn: 那裁缝把这套衣服做坏了.

sentences.en: The tailor has cut my coat very well.
sentences.cn: 裁缝把我的外衣裁得很好.

sentences.en: The tailor lined my coat with silk.
sentences.cn: 裁缝用绸作我外衣的衬里.

sentences.en: The tailor took him as his successor.
sentences.cn: 裁缝把他作为自己的接班人。

sentences.en: The tailor took my measure for a new suit.
sentences.cn: 裁缝量了我的尺寸准备为我做套新衣服.

sentences.en: These questions were tailor-made for Professor Posner.
sentences.cn: 这些问题请教波斯纳教授算是问对人了。

sentences.en: Treatment is tailored to the needs of each patient.
sentences.cn: 治疗方案是针对各个病人的需要而制订的。

sentences.en: We can tailor the programme to the patient's needs.
sentences.cn: 我们可以根据病人的需要调整这个方案。

sentences.en: You can tailor this to fit the scope of your project.
sentences.cn: 您可以对此方法进行定制以适应项目的范围。

words.tran_cn: 定做的；裁缝做的；剪裁讲究的
[服装] 剪裁，做衣服；裁缝业，成衣业
裁制；调整使适应（tailor的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to make men’s clothes, that are measured to fit each customer perfectly
If you tailor something such as a plan or system to someone's needs, you make it suitable for a particular person or purpose by changing the details of it

trans.tran_cn: 定制； 裁剪， 缝制； 使适应
